name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Elven Bow
description: A beautifully crafted bow made by skilled elven archers.
looks: The bow is made of a combination of wood and flexible elven materials. It is slim and delicate, yet sturdy and powerful.

special_weapon_skills.Archery: Increases accuracy and damage with bows.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that has the power to heal wounds and restore vitality.
looks: The staff is made of shimmering white wood and has a crystal orb at the top. The orb emits a soft glowing light.

special_effects.healing_energy: Restores health to allies within range.

name: Whispering Wind
description: A mystical dagger imbued with the power of the wind.
looks: The dagger has a slender blade with a curved design reminiscent of a swirling wind. The hilt is adorned with delicate silver filigree and a small gemstone that seems to shimmer with a soft breeze.

special_effects.Whirlwind Slash: Allows the wielder to perform a spinning attack that hits multiple enemies in close proximity.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Warrior's Helm
description: A sturdy helmet that provides excellent protection in battle.
looks: The helmet is made of strong metal and has a full-face visor. It has a crest on top and is adorned with engravings of mythical creatures.

name: Amulet of Wisdom
description: A mystical amulet that enhances the wearer's wisdom and intellect.
looks: The amulet is made of shimmering silver and is adorned with a large sapphire in the center. It emits a soft blue glow.

special_effects.knowledge_gain: Increases the rate at which the wearer gains knowledge and experience.

name: Spear
description: A long, shafted weapon with a pointed blade at one end, used for thrusting or throwing.
looks: The spear has a long wooden shaft with a metal point at one end. It is sleek and lightweight, perfect for quick strikes.
